RESETPASSWORD.TITLE: Reset your password
RESETPASSWORD.SUCCESS: Password has been changed. You were automatically logged in. You will be redirected to your panel shortly.
RESETPASSWORD.RESET_1: Invalid token or token expired. Make sure the link is correct or
RESETPASSWORD.RESET_2: generate a new link to change your password.

password.invalid_password: Error. Passwords should be the same and have at least 6 characters.

auth.no_user_found: An account with an email address was not found.
